content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 88.1 (1) of the Act, December 31, 2022 is prescribed as the later date.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of subsection 88.1 (1) of the Act, December 31, 2022 is prescribed as the later date.

content.content: 2. For the purposes of clause 88.1 (1) (b) of the Act, $100,422 is the amount prescribed for the period beginning January 1, 2022.
content.raw_html: 2. For the purposes of clause 88.1 (1) (b) of the Act, $100,422 is the amount prescribed for the period beginning January 1, 2022.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
